title: Cumin-Spiced Carrots
ingredients: ['350ml water', '900g carrots, peeled and sliced', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
